item.title: Thousands of Philadelphia city workers on strike but judge orders some back to work
item.description: A strike being staged by nearly 10,000 city workers in Philadelphia has entered its second day

item.title: Wisconsin Supreme Court’s liberal majority strikes down 176-year-old abortion ban
item.description: The Wisconsin Supreme Court has struck down the state’s 176-year-old abortion ban

item.title: A Tohono O'odham family integrates Catholic and Native beliefs in the Arizona desert
item.description: The history of encounters between Catholicism and Native spirituality has often been marred by violence and oppression
